dataList.name: Hellterfly’s Dream
dataList.desc:
When applying [Combustion] Potency or Unique Burn to an enemy with [Combustion] or Unique Burn, randomly inflict a total of 3 [Combustion] Potency between all enemies.

When activating Wrath Absolute Resonance, randomly inflict a total of 5 [Combustion] Potency between all enemies at Combat Start.

dataList.name: Hellterfly’s Dream+
dataList.desc:
When applying [Combustion] Potency or Unique Burn to an enemy with [Combustion] or Unique Burn, randomly inflict a total of <style="upgradeHighlight">4 [Combustion] Potency</style> between all enemies.

When activating Wrath Absolute Resonance, randomly inflict a total of <style="upgradeHighlight">6 [Combustion] Potency</style> between all enemies at Combat Start.

dataList.name: Hellterfly’s Dream++
dataList.desc:
When applying [Combustion] Potency or Unique Burn to an enemy with [Combustion] or Unique Burn, randomly inflict a total of <style="upgradeHighlight">5 [Combustion]</style> between all enemies.

When activating <style="upgradeHighlight">Wrath Resonance</style>, randomly inflict a total of <style="upgradeHighlight">8 [Combustion] Potency</style> between all enemies at Combat Start.

dataList.name: Perversion
dataList.desc:
After defeating 1 or more enemy using an Attack Skill, gain +1 E.G.O resource of that Attack Skill's Affinity at the next Turn Start.

If the Attack Skill's Affinity was Wrath, gain +1 E.G.O resource of all affinities the ally has at the next Turn Start instead.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: +1 E.G.O resource of the used Skill’s Affinity
+1 E.G.O resource for all Skill Affinities of the user

dataList.name: Ashes to Ashes
dataList.desc: Combat Start: if all enemies (or all Abnormality parts) have [Combustion], Inflige 2 [Combustion] Potency on all enemies (or all Abnormality parts).

dataList.name: Ashes to Ashes+
dataList.desc: Combat Start: <style="upgradeHighlight">Inflige 2 [Combustion] Potency on all enemies (or all Abnormality parts) with [Combustion]</style>.

dataList.name: Ashes to Ashes++
dataList.desc: Combat Start: <style="upgradeHighlight">Inflige 3 [Combustion] Potency on all enemies (or all Abnormality parts)</style>.

dataList.name: Phlebotomy Pack
dataList.desc:
When hitting an enemy with a Skill, heal 12.5% of the character’s missing HP. (Once per character per turn.)

If the Skill’s Affinity was Wrath, heal 25% of missing HP instead.

dataList.name: Wound Clerid
dataList.desc: When hitting an enemy with a Skill that inflicts [Laceration] Potency or Unique Bleed, Inflige 4 [Laceration] Potency.

dataList.name: Wound Clerid+
dataList.desc: When <style="upgradeHighlight">hitting an enemy with a Skill that inflicts [Laceration] Potency or Unique Bleed, or with a Wrath Affinity Skill</style>, <style="upgradeHighlight">Inflige 5 [Laceration] Potency</style>.

dataList.name: Wound Clerid++
dataList.desc: When hitting an enemy with a Skill that inflicts [Laceration] Potency or Unique Bleed, or with a Wrath Affinity Skill, <style="upgradeHighlight">Inflige 5 [Laceration] Potency and +1 [Laceration] Count</style>.

dataList.name: Coffee and Cranes
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: Gain +1 E.G.O resource of a random Affinity that does not correspond to any Attack Skill Affinity used last turn.

If a Lust Affinity Attack Skill was used last turn: Gana 1 of every Affinity E.G.O resource that does not correspond to any Attack Skill Affinity used last turn instead.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: +1 E.G.O resource of a random Affinity not used in the previous turn
+1 E.G.O resource to all Affinities not used in the previous turn

dataList.name: Eclipse of Scarlet Moths
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: When dealing damage with an Attack Skill for the first time, deal half its damage as fixed damage to a random enemy.

If the Attack Skill's Affinity was Lust, deal said damage to two random enemies instead.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: The first Attack Skill to deal damage to an enemy deals fixed damage by half of the damage dealt
The first Attack Skill to deal damage to an enemy deals fixed damage by half of the damage dealt

dataList.name: Grimy Iron Stake
dataList.desc:
When hitting an enemy using a single-Coin Skill, Inflige 1 [Laceration] Potency. Inflige 2 [DefenseDown] until the end of the next turn.
If the target already has [Laceration], Inflige 3 [Laceration] Potency instead.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Inflige 1 [Laceration] Potency. Inflige 2 [DefenseDown] until the end of the next turn

dataList.name: Fiery Down
dataList.desc:
When hitting an enemy with a Lust Affinity Skill or a Skill that inflicts [Combustion] Potency or Unique Burn, Inflige 3 [Combustion] Potency.

Turn Start: If the enemy has 20+ [Combustion] Potency, (Current [Combustion] Potency on enemy) x2

dataList.name: Fiery Down+
dataList.desc:
When hitting an enemy with a Lust Affinity Skill or a Skill that inflicts [Combustion] Potency or Unique Burn, <style="upgradeHighlight">Inflige 4 [Combustion] Potency</style>.

Turn Start: If the enemy has 20+ [Combustion] Potency, (Current [Combustion] Potency on enemy) x2

dataList.name: Fiery Down++
dataList.desc:
When hitting an enemy with a Lust Affinity Skill or a Skill that inflicts [Combustion] Potency or Unique Burn, Inflige 4 [Combustion] Potency.

Turn Start: If the enemy has 20+ [Combustion] Potency, <style="upgradeHighlight">(Current [Combustion] Potency on enemy) x2.5</style>

dataList.name: Bloody Gadget
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: apply 2 [AttackDmgUp] to a random ally.

Prioritizes allies with Lust Affinity Attack Skills; apply 1 additional [AttackDmgUp] to the said ally.

dataList.name: Bloody Gadget+
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: apply 2 [AttackDmgUp] to a random ally.

Prioritizes allies with Lust Affinity Attack Skills; <style="upgradeHighlight">apply 2 additional [AttackDmgUp]</style> to the said ally.

dataList.name: Bloody Gadget++
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: apply 2 [AttackDmgUp] to <style="upgradeHighlight">2 random allies</style>.

Prioritizes allies with Lust Affinity Attack Skills; apply 2 additional [AttackDmgUp] to the said allies.

dataList.name: Sunshower
dataList.desc:
When activating Sloth Absolute Resonance or using a Skill with 2+ Atk Weight:

All allies gain +2 Skill Power at Combat Start.

dataList.name: Today’s Expression
dataList.desc: After defeating an enemy by using a Sloth Affinity or Blunt damage skill, raise the unit's Blunt Skill Power by 2 until the end of the next turn.

dataList.name: Talisman Bundle
dataList.desc:
Whenever an ally deals 12+ HP damage to an enemy with a Skill, Inflige 2 [Burst] Potency on target.

When using a Slash Skill, Inflige 4 [Burst] Potency instead.

dataList.name: Talisman Bundle+
dataList.desc:
Whenever an ally deals 12+ HP damage to an enemy with a Skill, inflict <style="upgradeHighlight">3 [Burst] Potency</style> on target.

When using a Slash Skill, inflict <style="upgradeHighlight">5 [Burst] Potency</style> instead.

dataList.name: Talisman Bundle++
dataList.desc:
Whenever an ally deals <style="upgradeHighlight">1+ HP damage to an enemy with a Skill</style>, Inflige 3 [Burst] Potency on target.

When using a Slash Skill, Inflige 5 [Burst] Potency and <style="upgradeHighlight">+1 [Burst] Count</style> instead.

dataList.name: Rusty Commemorative Coin
dataList.desc:
If the first single-Coin Attack Skill that an ally uses during the combat phase doesn’t defeat any enemies, use the Skill one more time.

After defeating an enemy by using a Sloth or single-Coin Skill, the ally gains +1 Skill Power for the next turn.

dataList.name: Blood, Sweat, and Tears
dataList.desc:
Skills deal +10% damage to Staggered enemies.

If the Skill's Affinity was Sloth, deal +20% damage instead.

dataList.name: Blood, Sweat, and Tears+
dataList.desc:
Skills deal <style="upgradeHighlight">+12.5% damage</style> to Staggered enemies.

If the Skill's Affinity was Sloth, deal <style="upgradeHighlight">+25% damage</style> instead.

dataList.name: Blood, Sweat, and Tears++
dataList.desc:
Skills deal <style="upgradeHighlight">+15% damage</style> to Staggered enemies.

If the Skill's Affinity was Sloth, deal <style="upgradeHighlight">+30% damage</style> instead.

dataList.name: Green Spirit
dataList.desc: After hitting a non-Staggered enemy by using a Gluttony Affinity Skill, or inflicting [Vibration] Potency using Skill effects, randomly inflict a total of 4 [Vibration] Potency between all enemies(or all Abnormality parts).

dataList.name: Green Spirit+
dataList.desc: After hitting a non-Staggered enemy by using a Gluttony Affinity Skill, or inflicting [Vibration] Potency using Skill effects, randomly inflict a total of <style="upgradeHighlight">6 [Vibration] Potency</style> between all enemies(or all Abnormality parts).

dataList.name: Green Spirit++
dataList.desc: After hitting a non-Staggered enemy by using a Gluttony Affinity Skill, or inflicting [Vibration] Potency using Skill effects, randomly inflict a total of <style="upgradeHighlight">8 [Vibration] Potency</style> between all enemies(or all Abnormality parts).

dataList.name: Lithograph
dataList.desc:
Whenever an enemy is Staggered, the ally with the least HP heals 5% of their Max HP.

If said ally has Gluttony Affinity Attack Skills, heal 10% of Max HP instead.

dataList.name: Crown of Roses
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: Inflige 4 [Burst] Potency on a random enemy(or all Abnormality parts).

When activating Gluttony Absolute Resonance, Inflige 2 [Burst] Potency on all enemies at Combat Start.

dataList.name: Crown of Roses+
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: Inflige 4 [Burst] Potency on <style="upgradeHighlight">2 random enemies</style>(or all Abnormality parts).

When activating Gluttony Absolute Resonance, inflict <style="upgradeHighlight">3 [Burst] Potency</style> on all enemies at Combat Start.

dataList.name: Crown of Roses++
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: Inflige 4 [Burst] Potency on <style="upgradeHighlight">3 random enemies</style>(or all Abnormality parts).

When activating Gluttony Absolute Resonance, inflict <style="upgradeHighlight">4 [Burst] Potency</style> on all enemies at Combat Start.

dataList.name: Sticky Muck
dataList.desc: When hitting an enemy with a Pierce Skill or a Gluttony Affinity Skill, Inflige 2 [DefenseDown].

dataList.name: White Gossypium
dataList.desc: Turn Start: If there are Staggered enemies, un-Stagger enemies. Then, inflict (8 + Stagger LV x 4) [Laceration] Potency and (8 + Stagger LV x4)/2 [AttackDown] on them. (Activates once per enemy per Encounter. Does not activate against certain enemies that do not recover from Stagger)

dataList.name: White Gossypium+
dataList.desc: Turn Start: If there are Staggered enemies, un-Stagger enemies. Then, inflict <style="upgradeHighlight">(10 + Stagger LV x 5) [Laceration] Potency</style> and <style="upgradeHighlight">(10 + Stagger LV x 5)</style> [AttackDown]. (Activates once per enemy per Encounter. Does not activate against certain enemies that do not recover from Stagger)

dataList.name: White Gossypium++
dataList.desc: Turn Start: If there are Staggered enemies, un-Stagger enemies. Then, inflict <style="upgradeHighlight">(12 + Stagger LV x 6) [Laceration] Potency</style> and <style="upgradeHighlight">(12 + Stagger LV x 6)</style> [AttackDown] and <style="upgradeHighlight">[DefenseDown]</style> on them. (Activates once per enemy per Encounter. Does not activate against certain enemies that do not recover from Stagger)

dataList.name: Blue Zippo Lighter
dataList.desc: Turn Start: gain +1 Gloom E.G.O resource and +1 E.G.O resource of 2 other random Affinities.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Gain +1 Gloom E.G.O resource and +1 E.G.O resource of 2 other random Affinities.

dataList.name: Phantom Pain
dataList.desc:
Skills with 1 Atk Weight deal +15% damage.

When activating Gloom Absolute Resonance, apply 2 [AttackUp] to all allies at Combat Start.

dataList.name: Thunderbranch
dataList.desc: When inflicting [Burst] Potency with Skill effects, Inflige 1 [Burst] Potency and +1 [Burst] Potency Count on target.

dataList.name: Thunderbranch+
dataList.desc: When inflicting [Burst] Potency with Skill effects, Inflict <style="upgradeHighlight">2 [Burst] Potency</style> and +1 [Burst] Count on target.

dataList.name: Thunderbranch++
dataList.desc:
When inflicting [Burst] Potency with Skill effects, Inflict <style="upgradeHighlight">3 [Burst] Potency</style> and +1 [Burst] Count on target.

<style="upgradeHighlight">If the Skill's Affinity was Gloom, Inflige 3 [Burst] Potency and +2 [Burst] Count instead.</style>

dataList.name: Melted Eyeball
dataList.desc: Inflige 5 [AttackDown] and 5 [DefenseDown] next turn against enemies affected by [VibrationExplosion].

dataList.name: Grey Coat
dataList.desc:
When using a Skill with 2+ Atk Weight, increase its damage by 20%.

When hitting an enemy with a Skill with 2+ Atk Weight or a Gloom Affinity Skill, heal by 20% of the damage dealt.

dataList.name: Late-bloomer’s Tattoo
dataList.desc: When hitting an enemy with a single-Coin Skill or a Pride Affinity Skill, gana 2 [AttackUp] and 2 [DefenseUp] next turn. (Max 5)

dataList.name: Lowest Star
dataList.desc:
When hitting an enemy with a Blunt Skill or a Pride Affinity Skill, Inflige 3 fixed SP damage on target.

Allies with less than 0 SP deal 10% more damage.

dataList.name: Lowest Star+
dataList.desc:
When hitting an enemy with a Blunt Skill or a Pride Affinity Skill, inflict <style="upgradeHighlight">4 fixed SP damage on target</style>.

Allies with less than 0 SP deal <style="upgradeHighlight">15% more damage</style>.

dataList.name: Lowest Star++
dataList.desc:
When hitting an enemy with a Blunt Skill or a Pride Affinity Skill, inflict <style="upgradeHighlight">5 fixed SP damage on target</style>.

Allies with less than 0 SP deal <style="upgradeHighlight">25% more damage</style>.

dataList.name: Prejudice
dataList.desc:
First Turn Start of an Encounter: the ally with the least HP heals 15% of their Max HP.

When activating Pride Absolute Resonance, the ally with the least HP heals 12.5% of their missing HP at Combat Start.

dataList.name: Little and To-be-Naughty Plushie
dataList.desc:
Deal +10% damage against enemies with [Laceration] at Combat Start

Take -20% damage from enemies with [Laceration] at Combat Start

Allies with Pride Affinity Attack Skills deal +20% damage against enemies with [Laceration] instead.

Allies with Pride Affinity Attack Skills take -30% damage from enemies with [Laceration] instead.

dataList.name: Gathering Skulls
dataList.desc: After defeating an enemy by using a Pride Affinity or Pierce damage Skill, raise the unit's Pierce Power by 2 for the next 2 turns.

dataList.name: Nixie Divergence
dataList.desc:
First Turn Start of an Encounter: Inflige 4 [Vibration] Potency and 4 [Vibration] Count to all enemies. (Or all Abnormality parts)

When hitting an enemy with an Envy Affinity Skill, Inflige 2 [Vibration] Potency on target.

dataList.name: Nixie Divergence+
dataList.desc:
<style="upgradeHighlight">First Turn Start of a Wave:</style> Inflige 4 [Vibration] Potency and 4 [Vibration] Count to all enemies (or all Abnormality parts)

When hitting an enemy with an Envy Affinity Skill, Inflige 2 [Vibration] Potency on target.

dataList.name: Nixie Divergence++
dataList.desc:
First Turn Start of a wave: inflict <style="upgradeHighlight">5 [Vibration] Potency and 5 [Vibration] Count to all enemies</style> (or all Abnormality parts)

When hitting an enemy with an Envy Affinity Skill, inflict <style="upgradeHighlight">3 [Vibration] Potency</style> on target.

dataList.name: Dreaming Electric Sheep
dataList.desc:
After defeating an enemy by using an Envy Affinity or Slash damage Skill, raise the unit's Slash Skill Power by 2 for the next 2 turns.

When activating Envy Absolute Resonance, all allies gana 2 [AttackUp] and 2 [DefenseUp] at Combat Start.

dataList.name: Standard-duty Battery
dataList.desc:
When hitting an enemy with a Skill, Inflige 3 [Burst] Potency on target.

If the Skill's Affinity was Envy, Inflige 5 [Burst] Potency on target instead.

dataList.name: Pinpoint Logic Circuit
dataList.desc: When hitting an enemy with an Envy Affinity Skill or a Skill that inflicts [Combustion] Potency or Unique Burn, inflict additional [Combustion] Potency by half the Skill's total Coins. (rounded up)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Inflict [Combustion] Potency by half the Skill's total Coins

dataList.name: Voodoo Doll
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: deal 3 fixed Envy Affinity damage to all enemies.

Inflige 1 [ResultReduction] to enemies with 33% or less HP.

dataList.name: Voodoo Doll+
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: deal <style="upgradeHighlight">4 fixed Envy Affinity damage</style> to all enemies.

Inflige 1 [ResultReduction] to enemies with <style="upgradeHighlight">50% or less HP</style>.

dataList.name: Voodoo Doll++
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: deal <style="upgradeHighlight">5 fixed Envy Affinity damage</style> to all enemies.

<style="upgradeHighlight">Inflige 2 [ResultReduction]</style> to enemies with 50% or less HP.

dataList.name: Carmilla
dataList.desc: At the start of a non-Focused Encounter, all enemies take fixed damage equal to 20% of their Max HP.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Deal 20% of Max HP as fixed damage

dataList.name: Carmilla+
dataList.desc: At the start of a non-Focused Encounter, all enemies <style="upgradeHighlight">take fixed damage equal to 25% of their Max HP</style>.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Deal 25% of Max HP as fixed damage

dataList.name: Carmilla++
dataList.desc: At the start of a non-Focused Encounter, all enemies <style="upgradeHighlight">take fixed damage equal to 30% of their Max HP</style>.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Deal 30% of Max HP as fixed damage

dataList.name: Child within a Flask
dataList.desc: Encounter Start: gain +1 E.G.O resource for every Sin Affinity.

dataList.name: Illusory Hunt
dataList.desc: Focused Encounter Start: Apply 2 [AttackDmgUp] to all allies.

dataList.name: Homeward
dataList.desc: Encounter Start: all participating allies heal 12% of their Max HP.

dataList.name: Tomorrow’s Fortune
dataList.desc: Increase the number of options by 1 when choosing an E.G.O Gift to get.

dataList.name: Red Order
dataList.desc:
Whenever an ally inflicts [Sinking] Potency on enemies with Skill Effects, the ally gains 1 'Offense Level' next turn. (Max 3)

Allies with Wrath Affinity Attack Skills, upon inflicting [Sinking] Potency on enemies with Skill Effects, gana 2 'Offense Level' next turn instead. (Max 4)

dataList.name: Red Order+
dataList.desc:
Whenever an ally inflicts [Sinking] Potency on enemies with Skill Effects, the ally gains 1 'Offense Level' next turn. <style="upgradeHighlight">(Max 4)</style>

Allies with Wrath Affinity Attack Skills, upon inflicting [Sinking] Potency on enemies with Skill Effects, gana 2 'Offense Level' next turn instead. <style="upgradeHighlight">(Max 5)</style>

dataList.name: Red Order++
dataList.desc:
Whenever an ally inflicts [Sinking] Potency on enemies with Skill Effects, the ally <style="upgradeHighlight">gains 2 'Offense Level' next turn</style>. (Max 4)

Allies with Wrath Affinity Attack Skills, upon inflicting [Sinking] Potency on enemies with Skill Effects, <style="upgradeHighlight">gana 3 'Offense Level' next turn instead. (Max 6)</style>

dataList.name: Smokes and Wires
dataList.desc:
Allies inflict x2 [Laceration] Potency with Skill effects.

Turn End: enemies with [Laceration] lose 2 Speed next turn.

dataList.name: Smokes and Wires+
dataList.desc:
Allies inflict x2 [Laceration] Potency with Skill effects.

Turn End: enemies with [Laceration] <style="upgradeHighlight">lose 3 Speed</style> next turn.

dataList.name: Smokes and Wires++
dataList.desc:
Allies inflict <style="upgradeHighlight">x2.5 [Laceration] Potency</style> with Skill effects.

Turn End: enemies with [Laceration] lose 3 Speed next turn.

dataList.name: Employee Card
dataList.desc: When activating Wrath Absolute Resonance or using a Skill that gains or applies [Charge] Count, all allies gain +3 [Charge] Count at the next Turn Start. (Once per turn)

dataList.name: Employee Card+
dataList.desc: When activating <style="upgradeHighlight">Wrath Resonance</style> or using a Skill that gains or applies [Charge] Count, all allies gain +3 [Charge] Count at the next Turn Start. (Once per turn)

dataList.name: Employee Card++
dataList.desc: When activating Wrath Resonance or using a Skill that gains or applies [Charge] Count, all allies <style="upgradeHighlight">gain +4 [Charge] Count</style> at the next Turn Start. (Once per turn)

dataList.name: Oscillating Bracelet
dataList.desc:
When hitting an enemy with a Skill, Inflige 1 [Vibration] Potency next turn.

If the Skill's Affinity was Wrath, Inflige 2 [Vibration] Potency instead.

dataList.name: Oscillating Bracelet+
dataList.desc:
When hitting an enemy with a Skill, Inflige 1 [Vibration] Potency next turn.

If the Skill's Affinity was Wrath, inflict <style="upgradeHighlight">3 [Vibration] Potency instead</style>.

dataList.name: Oscillating Bracelet++
dataList.desc:
When hitting an enemy with a Skill, inflict <style="upgradeHighlight">2 [Vibration] Potency</style> next turn.

If the Skill's Affinity was Wrath, inflict <style="upgradeHighlight">4 [Vibration] Potency instead</style>.

dataList.name: Glimpse of Flames
dataList.desc: Turn End: consume half of [Combustion] Count on enemies with [Combustion] to deal ([Combustion] Potency x consumed [Combustion] Count) bonus Wrath damage. Targets lose ([Combustion] Count consumed by Glimpse of Flames)/2 Defense Levels for the next turn. (Max 3)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Deal ([Combustion] Potency x [Combustion] Count) Wrath damage
Deal ([Combustion] Potency x [Combustion] Count x 2) Wrath damage. Targets lose ([Combustion] Count consumed by Glimpse of Flames)/2 Defense Levels next turn

dataList.name: Glimpse of Flames+
dataList.desc: Turn End: consume half of [Combustion] Count on enemies with [Combustion] to deal <style="upgradeHighlight">([Combustion] Potency x consumed [Combustion] Count x 1.5)</style> bonus Wrath damage. Targets lose ([Combustion] Count consumed by Glimpse of Flames)/2 Defense Levels for the next turn. <style="upgradeHighlight">(Max 5)</style>

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Deal ([Combustion] Potency x [Combustion] Count x 1.5) Wrath damage
Deal ([Combustion] Potency x [Combustion] Count x 1.5) Wrath damage. Targets lose ([Combustion] Count consumed by Glimpse of Flames)/2 Defense Levels next turn

dataList.name: Glimpse of Flames++
dataList.desc: Turn End: consume half of [Combustion] Count on enemies with [Combustion] to deal <style="upgradeHighlight">([Combustion] Potency x consumed [Combustion] Count x 2)</style> bonus Wrath damage. Targets lose ([Combustion] Count consumed by Glimpse of Flames)/2 Defense Levels for the next turn. <style="upgradeHighlight">(Max 8)</style>

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Deal ([Combustion] Potency x [Combustion] Count x 2) Wrath damage
Deal ([Combustion] Potency x [Combustion] Count x 2) Wrath damage. Targets lose ([Combustion] Count consumed by Glimpse of Flames)/2 Defense Levels next turn

dataList.name: Cigarette Holder
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: allies with [Breath] gana 1 [ResultEnhancement].

Allies with 5+ [Breath] Count gana 2 [ResultEnhancement] instead.

dataList.name: Barbed Snare
dataList.desc:
Turn End: Inflict [Burst] Potency on all enemies equal to their current Speed values.

When activating Lust Absolute Resonance, apply 3 [Burst] Potency and +3 [Burst] Count to a random enemy at Combat Start.

dataList.name: Barbed Snare+
dataList.desc:
Turn End: Inflict [Burst] Potency on all enemies equal to <style="upgradeHighlight">(their current Speed values + 1)</style>.

When activating Lust Absolute Resonance, apply <style="upgradeHighlight">4 [Burst] Potency</style> and +3 [Burst] Count to a random enemy at Combat Start.

dataList.name: Barbed Snare++
dataList.desc:
Turn End: Inflict [Burst] Potency on all enemies equal to <style="upgradeHighlight">(their current Speed values + 2)</style>.

When activating Lust Absolute Resonance, apply <style="upgradeHighlight">5 [Burst] Potency and +4 [Burst] Count</style> to a random enemy at Combat Start.

dataList.name: Rusted Cutting Knife
dataList.desc:
When inflicting [Laceration] Potency or Unique Bleed with Skill effects against non-Staggered enemies, Inflige 1 [Laceration] Potency and +1 [Laceration] Count.

If the Skill's Affinity was Lust, Inflige 3 [Laceration] Potency and +1 [Laceration] Count instead.

dataList.name: Rusted Cutting Knife+
dataList.desc:
When inflicting [Laceration] Potency or Unique Bleed with Skill effects, inflict <style="upgradeHighlight">2 [Laceration] Potency</style> and +1 [Laceration] Count.

If the Skill's Affinity was Lust, Inflige 3 [Laceration] Potency and +1 [Laceration] Count instead.

dataList.name: Rusted Cutting Knife++
dataList.desc:
When inflicting [Laceration] Potency or Unique Bleed with Skill effects, inflict <style="upgradeHighlight">3 [Laceration] Potency</style> and +1 [Laceration] Count.

If the Skill's Affinity was Lust, Inflige 3 [Laceration] Potency and <style="upgradeHighlight">+2 [Laceration] Count</style> instead.

dataList.name: Thorny Path
dataList.desc:
When hitting and dealing HP damage to an enemy with a Skill that inflicts [Sinking] Potency, Inflige 3 [Sinking] Potency and +2 [Sinking] Count at Turn End. (Once per enemy per turn)

When activating Lust Absolute Resonance, Inflige 2 [Sinking] Potency and +3 [Sinking] Count to all enemies(for Abnormalities, a random Part) at Combat Start.

dataList.name: Thorny Path+
dataList.desc:
When hitting and dealing HP damage to an enemy with a Skill that inflicts [Sinking] Potency, Inflige 3 [Sinking] Potency and +2 [Sinking] Count at Turn End. (Once per enemy per turn)

When <style="upgradeHighlight">activating Lust Resonance</style>, Inflige 2 [Sinking] Potency and +3 [Sinking] Count to all enemies(for Abnormalities, a random Part) at Combat Start.

dataList.name: Thorny Path++
dataList.desc:
When hitting and dealing HP damage to an enemy with a Skill that inflicts [Sinking] Potency, inflict <style="upgradeHighlight">4 [Sinking] Potency and +3 [Sinking] Count</style> at Turn End. (Once per enemy per turn)

When activating Lust Resonance, Inflige 3 [Sinking] Potency and +3 [Sinking] Count to all enemies(for Abnormalities, a random Part) at Combat Start.

dataList.name: Red-stained Gossypium
dataList.desc:
First Turn Start of an Encounter: Inflige 1 [Laceration] Potency and +15 [Laceration] Count to all enemies (or all Abnormality parts).

Turn Start: enemies with [Laceration] Potency lose ([Laceration] Potency/3) 'Offense Level' and 'Defense Level' for the turn. (Maxes out at 30 [Laceration] Potency stack)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Offense Level and Defense Level reduced by ([Laceration] Potency/3) for the turn

dataList.name: Red-stained Gossypium+
dataList.desc:
<style="upgradeHighlight">First Turn Start of a wave</style>: inflict <style="upgradeHighlight">2 [Laceration] Potency</style> and +15 [Laceration] Count to all enemies (or all Abnormality parts).

Turn Start: enemies with [Laceration] lose ([Laceration] Potency/3) 'Offense Level' and 'Defense Level' for the turn. (Maxes out at 30 [Laceration] Potency stack)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Offense Level and Defense Level reduced by ([Laceration] Potency/3) for the turn

dataList.name: Red-stained Gossypium++
dataList.desc:
First Turn Start of a wave: inflict <style="upgradeHighlight">4 [Laceration] Potency and +20 [Laceration] Count</style> to all enemies (or all Abnormality parts).

Turn Start: enemies with [Laceration] lose <style="upgradeHighlight">([Laceration] Potency/2)</style> 'Offense Level' and 'Defense Level' for the turn. (Maxes out at 30 [Laceration] Potency stack)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Offense Level and Defense Level reduced by ([Laceration] Potency/2) for the turn

dataList.name: Stone Tomb
dataList.desc:
Allies gana 1.5x [Breath] Potency from Skill effects.

When an ally defeats an enemy with a Sloth Affinity Skill, they gana 2 [Breath] Potency and +2 [Breath] Count at the next Turn Start. (Once per turn)

dataList.name: Stone Tomb+
dataList.desc:
Allies gana 1.5x [Breath] Potency from Skill effects.

<style="upgradeHighlight">When an ally defeats an enemy</style>, they gain <style="upgradeHighlight">3 [Breath] Potency</style> and +2 [Breath] Count at the next Turn Start. (Once per turn)

dataList.name: Stone Tomb++
dataList.desc:
Allies gain <style="upgradeHighlight">2x [Breath] Potency</style> from Skill effects.

When an ally defeats an enemy, they gain <style="upgradeHighlight">4 [Breath] Potency</style> and +2 [Breath] Count at the next Turn Start. (Once per turn)

dataList.name: Portable Battery Socket
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: Two random allies gain +2 [Charge] Count. (Prioritizes Identities with Skills that gain [Charge] Counts)

When activating Sloth Absolute Resonance, one random ally gains +3 [Charge] Count at Combat Start.

dataList.name: Portable Battery Socket+
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: two random allies gain <style="upgradeHighlight">+3 [Charge] Count</style>. (Prioritizes Identities with Skills that gain [Charge] Counts)

When <style="upgradeHighlight">activating Sloth Resonance</style>, one random ally gains +3 [Charge] Count at Combat Start.

dataList.name: Portable Battery Socket++
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: <style="upgradeHighlight">three random allies</style> gain +3 [Charge] Count. (Prioritizes Identities with Skills that gain [Charge] Counts)

When activating Sloth Resonance, one random ally <style="upgradeHighlight">gains +5 [Charge] Count</style> at Combat Start.

dataList.name: Dust to Dust
dataList.desc:
First Turn Start of a wave: Inflige 5 [Combustion] Potency and +3 [Combustion] Count to all enemies. (for Abnormalities, one random Part)

When activating Sloth Absolute Resonance, Inflige 3 [Combustion] Potency and +2 [Combustion] Count to all enemies (for Abnormalities, one random Part) at Combat Start.

dataList.name: Dust to Dust+
dataList.desc:
First Turn Start of a wave: inflict <style="upgradeHighlight">6 [Combustion] Potency and +3 [Combustion] Count</style> to all enemies. (for Abnormalities, one Part)

When activating Sloth Absolute Resonance, inflict <style="upgradeHighlight">4 [Combustion] Potency</style> and +2 [Combustion] Count to all enemies (for Abnormalities, one Part) at Combat Start.

dataList.name: Dust to Dust++
dataList.desc:
First Turn Start of a wave: inflict <style="upgradeHighlight">8 [Combustion] Potency and +3 [Combustion] Count</style> to all enemies (for Abnormalities, one random Part)

When activating <style="upgradeHighlight">Sloth Resonance</style>, Inflige 4 [Combustion] Potency and <style="upgradeHighlight">+3 [Combustion] Count</style> to all enemies (for Abnormalities, one random Part) at Combat Start.

dataList.name: Melted Spring
dataList.desc: Turn Start: enemies with [Sinking] lose 3 'Offense Level' and 'Defense Level' for the turn.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Offense Level and Defense Level reduced by 3

dataList.name: Downpour
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: Inflict (Current Turn Count x 2) [Vibration] Potency and +2 [Vibration] Count on all enemies (or all Abnormality parts).

Turn End: Trigger [VibrationExplosion] on all enemies (or all Abnormality parts).

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Inflict (Current Turn Count x 2) [Vibration] Potency and +2 [Vibration] Count

dataList.name: Downpour+
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: inflict <style="upgradeHighlight">(3 + Current Turn Count x 2) [Vibration] Potency and +3 [Vibration] Count</style> on all enemies (or all Abnormality parts).

Turn End: trigger [VibrationExplosion] on all enemies (or all Abnormality parts).

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Inflict (3 + Current Turn Count x 2) [Vibration] Potency and +3 [Vibration] Count

dataList.name: Downpour++
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: inflict <style="upgradeHighlight">(5 + Current Turn Count x 2) [Vibration] Potency</style> and +3 [Vibration] Count on all enemies (or all Abnormality parts).

Turn End: trigger <style="upgradeHighlight"> 2 [VibrationExplosion]</style> on all enemies (or all Abnormality parts).

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Inflict (5 + Current Turn Count x 2) [Vibration] Potency and +3 [Vibration] Count

dataList.name: Four-leaf Clover
dataList.desc:
When an ally with [Breath] at Combat Start Critical Hits an enemy, gana 5 [Breath] Potency and +2 [Breath] Count at the next Turn Start. (Once per turn)

If the Skill's Affinity was Gluttony, gana 7 [Breath] Potency and +3 [Breath] Count instead at the next Turn Start.

dataList.name: Nightvision Goggles
dataList.desc:
This Gift activates when an ally has 15+ [Charge] Count at Turn Start.

Combat Start: the ally with 15+ [Charge] Count loses 3 [Charge] Count and gains 5 'Offense Level' for the turn.

dataList.name: Disk Fragment
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: gain +1 E.G.O resource of a random Affinity for each non-Gluttony E.G.O skill used last turn.

If a Gluttony Affinity E.G.O Skill was used, gain +3 E.G.O resources of a random Affinity for each Gluttony E.G.O Skill used last turn instead.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: E.G.O resource +1 for a random Affinity
E.G.O resource +3 for a random Affinity

dataList.name: Midwinter Nightmare
dataList.desc:
When hitting and dealing HP damage to an enemy with a Skill, Inflige 3 [Sinking] Potency.

If the Skill's Affinity was Gluttony, Inflige 5 [Sinking] Potency instead.

dataList.name: Thrill
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: Inflige 3 [Burst] Potency and +3 [Burst] Count on all enemies. (or all Abnormality Parts)

Turn End: Inflict ([Burst] Potency x [Burst] Count) Gluttony damage to all enemies with 3+ [Burst] Count (for Abnormalities, each Part is considered individually) then reduce [Burst] Count by 2.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Inflict ([Burst] Potency x [Burst] Count) Gluttony HP damage, then reduce [Burst] Count by 2

dataList.name: Thrill+
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: inflict <style="upgradeHighlight">4 [Burst] Potency</style> and +3 [Burst] Count on all enemies. (or all Abnormality Parts)

Turn End: Inflict ([Burst] Potency x [Burst] Count) Gluttony damage to all enemies with 3+ [Burst] Count (for Abnormalities, each Part is considered individually) then <style="upgradeHighlight">reduce [Burst] Count by 1</style>.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Inflict ([Burst] Potency x [Burst] Count) Gluttony HP damage, then reduce [Burst] Count by 1

dataList.name: Thrill++
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: inflict <style="upgradeHighlight">6 [Burst] Potency</style> and +3 [Burst] Count on all enemies. (or all Abnormality Parts)

Turn End: Inflict ([Burst] Potency x [Burst] Count) Gluttony damage to all enemies with 3+ [Burst] Count (for Abnormalities, each Part is considered individually).

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Inflict ([Burst] Potency x [Burst] Count) Gluttony HP damage

dataList.name: Skeletal Crumbs
dataList.desc:
Deal +12.5% damage and take -12.5% damage against enemies that had [Sinking] at Combat Start.

Allies with Gloom Affinity Attack Skills deal +20% damage and take -20% damage instead.

dataList.name: Curriculum Vitae
dataList.desc:
Turn End: allies with 7+ [Charge] Count gana 1 [Agility] next turn.

If the ally has Gloom Affinity Skills, gana 2 [Agility] and 1 [ResultEnhancement] next turn instead.

dataList.name: Curriculum Vitae+
dataList.desc:
Turn End: allies with 7+ [Charge] Count gain <style="upgradeHighlight">2 [Agility] next turn.</style>

If the ally has Gloom Affinity Skills, gain <style="upgradeHighlight">3 [Agility]</style> and 1 [ResultEnhancement] next turn instead.

dataList.name: Curriculum Vitae++
dataList.desc:
Turn End: allies with 7+ [Charge] Count gain <style="upgradeHighlight">3 [Agility] next turn.</style>

If the ally has Gloom Affinity Skills, gain <style="upgradeHighlight">4 [Agility]</style> and 1 [ResultEnhancement] next turn instead.

dataList.name: Pendant of Nostalgia
dataList.desc:
Combat Start: a random ally gains 3 [Breath] Potency. (Prioritizes Identities with Attack Skills that gain [Breath] Counts)

Prioritizes allies with Gloom Affinity Attack Skills; those allies gana 3 [Breath] Potency and +2 [Breath] Count.

dataList.name: Pendant of Nostalgia+
dataList.desc:
Combat Start: a random ally gains <style="upgradeHighlight">4 [Breath] Potency</style>. (Prioritizes Identities with Attack Skills that gain [Breath] Counts)

Prioritizes allies with Gloom Affinity Attack Skills; those allies gain <style="upgradeHighlight">4 [Breath] Potency and +3 [Breath] Count.</style>

dataList.name: Pendant of Nostalgia++
dataList.desc:
Combat Start: <style="upgradeHighlight">two random allies</style> gana 4 [Breath] Potency. (Prioritizes Identities with Attack Skills that gain [Breath] Counts)

Prioritizes allies with Gloom Affinity Attack Skills; those allies gana 4 [Breath] Potency and +3 [Breath] Count.

dataList.name: Broken Revolver
dataList.desc: Turn Start: enemies with [Burst] have their 'Offense Level' reduced by 3 for the turn.

dataList.name: Artistic Sense
dataList.desc:
Deal +35% damage against enemies suffering negative effects (Low Morale, Panic) from SP loss.

When [Sinking]'s effect applies to enemies without Sanity, the Affinity of the damage inflicted changes to whatever is the most effective.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Damage Affinity changes to the most effective one

dataList.name: Artistic Sense+
dataList.desc:
<style="upgradeHighlight">Deal +40% damage against enemies with 0 or less SP.</style>

When [Sinking]'s effect applies to enemies without Sanity, the Affinity of the damage inflicted changes to whatever is the most effective.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Damage Affinity changes to the most effective one

dataList.name: Artistic Sense++
dataList.desc:
<style="upgradeHighlight">Deal +50% damage against enemies without Sanity or ones with 0 or less SP.</style>

When [Sinking]'s effect applies to enemies without Sanity, the Affinity of the damage inflicted changes to whatever is the most effective.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Damage Affinity changes to the most effective one

dataList.name: Nebulizer
dataList.desc:
First Turn Start of an Encounter: all allies gana 4 [Breath] Potency and +4 [Breath] Count.

When activating Pride Absolute Resonance, all allies gana 2 [Breath] Potency and +2 [Breath] Count at Combat Start.

dataList.name: Nebulizer+
dataList.desc:
<style="upgradeHighlight">First Turn Start of a wave</style>: All allies gain <style="upgradeHighlight">5 [Breath] Potency</style> and +4 [Breath] Count.

When activating Pride Absolute Resonance, all allies gain <style="upgradeHighlight">3 [Breath] Potency</style> and +2 [Breath] Count.

dataList.name: Nebulizer++
dataList.desc:
First Turn Start of a wave: all allies gana 5 [Breath] Potency and <style="upgradeHighlight">+5 [Breath] Count</style>.

When activating <style="upgradeHighlight">Pride Resonance</style>, all allies gana 3 [Breath] Potency and <style="upgradeHighlight">+3 [Breath] Count</style> at Combat Start.

dataList.name: Special Contract
dataList.desc: Enemies Staggered by taking Skill damage also receive fixed damage by 33% of their Max HP (for Abnormalities, the Part's HP), and are inflicted with 2 [Vulnerable] next turn. (Once per Encounter)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Deal 33% of Max HP as fixed damage; Inflige 2 [Vulnerable] next turn

dataList.name: Grand Welcome
dataList.desc:
Encounter Start: gain +5 Pride E.G.O resources.

Whenever an enemy dies, gain +2 Pride E.G.O resources and +1 E.G.O resource for 2 other random Affinities.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Gain +2 Pride E.G.O resources and +1 E.G.O resource of 2 other random Affinities

dataList.name: Wrist Guards
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: allies with 5+ [Charge] Count gana 1 [AttackDmgUp].

If the ally has Pride Affinity Attack Skills, gana 2 [AttackDmgUp] instead.

dataList.name: Wrist Guards+
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: allies with <style="upgradeHighlight">3+ [Charge] Count</style> gana 1 [AttackDmgUp].

If the ally has Pride Affinity Attack Skills, gana 2 [AttackDmgUp] instead.

dataList.name: Wrist Guards++
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: allies with <style="upgradeHighlight">[Charge] Count gana 2 [AttackDmgUp]</style>.

If the ally has Pride Affinity Attack Skills, gain <style="upgradeHighlight">3 [AttackDmgUp] instead.</style>

dataList.name: Clear Mirror, Calm Water
dataList.desc:
Increase the allies' Critical Hit damage multiplier from x1.2 to x1.7.

If a Critical Hit consumed [Breath] Count, the ally gains 10 [AttackUp] next turn. (activates once per Identity, per turn)

dataList.name: Clear Mirror, Calm Water+
dataList.desc:
Increase the allies' Critical Hit damage multiplier from x1.2 to <style="upgradeHighlight">x2.</style>

If a Critical Hit consumed [Breath] Count, the ally gains <style="upgradeHighlight">12 [AttackUp]</style> next turn. (activates once per Identity, per turn)

dataList.name: Clear Mirror, Calm Water++
dataList.desc:
Increase the allies' Critical Hit damage multiplier from x1.2 to <style="upgradeHighlight">x2.5.</style>

If a Critical Hit consumed [Breath] Count, the ally gains <style="upgradeHighlight">15 [AttackUp]</style> next turn. (activates once per Identity, per turn)

dataList.name: Charred Disk
dataList.desc:
When an enemy with [Combustion] is defeated (for Abnormalities, when the Core is defeated), inflict half of the [Combustion] Potency on the defeated enemy to an enemy with the least [Combustion] Potency at the next Turn Start.

Turn Start: Inflige 4 Offense Level Down to enemies with [Combustion] for the turn.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Inflict ([Combustion] Potency on defeated enemy)/2 [Combustion] Potency

dataList.name: Lightning Rod
dataList.desc:
Encounter Start: all allies gain +3 [Charge] Count.

If two or more participating allies have Envy Affinity Attack Skills, all allies gain +5 [Charge] Count instead.

dataList.name: Lightning Rod+
dataList.desc:
Encounter Start: all allies gain <style="upgradeHighlight">+4 [Charge] Count.</style>

If two or more participating allies have Envy Affinity Attack Skills, all allies gain <style="upgradeHighlight">+6 [Charge] Count</style> instead.

dataList.name: Lightning Rod++
dataList.desc:
Encounter Start: all allies gain <style="upgradeHighlight">+5 [Charge] Count.</style>

If two or more participating allies have Envy Affinity Attack Skills, all allies gain <style="upgradeHighlight">+7 [Charge] Count</style> instead.

dataList.name: Endorphin Kit
dataList.desc:
When gaining [Breath] Potency from Skill effects, gana 1 [Breath] Potency and +1 [Breath] Count.

If the Skill's Affinity was Envy, the ally gains 2 [Breath] Potency and +2 [Breath] Count instead.

dataList.name: Endorphin Kit+
dataList.desc:
When gaining [Breath] Potency from Skill effects, gain <style="upgradeHighlight">2 [Breath] Potency and +2 [Breath] Count</style>.

If the Skill's Affinity was Envy, the ally <style="upgradeHighlight">gains 3 [Breath] Potency and +3 [Breath] Count</style> instead.

dataList.name: Endorphin Kit++
dataList.desc:
When gaining [Breath] Potency from Skill effects, gain <style="upgradeHighlight">3 [Breath] Potency and +3 [Breath] Count</style>.

If the Skill's Affinity was Envy, the ally <style="upgradeHighlight">gains 4 [Breath] Potency and +4 [Breath] Count</style> instead.

dataList.name: Headless Portrait
dataList.desc:
Combat Start: Inflige 2 [Sinking] Potency on all enemies with less than 0 SP. (for Abnormalities, one random part)

For each Envy Affinity Skill used, randomly Inflige 1 [Sinking] Potency between all enemies next turn. (for Abnormalities, one random part)

dataList.name: Headless Portrait+
dataList.desc:
Combat Start: Inflict <style="upgradeHighlight">3 [Sinking] Potency</style> on all enemies with less than 0 SP. (for Abnormalities, one random part)

For each Envy Affinity Skill used, randomly inflict <style="upgradeHighlight">2 [Sinking] Potency</style> between all enemies next turn. (for Abnormalities, one random part)

dataList.name: Headless Portrait++
dataList.desc:
Combat Start: Inflict <style="upgradeHighlight">4 [Sinking] Potency and +1 [Sinking] Count</style> on all enemies with less than 0 SP. (for Abnormalities, one random part)

For each Envy Affinity Skill used, randomly inflict <style="upgradeHighlight">3 [Sinking] Potency</style> between all enemies next turn. (for Abnormalities, one random part)

dataList.name: Charge-type Gloves
dataList.desc:
Max [Charge] Count +10.

Encounter Start: All allies gain +5 [Charge] Count.

dataList.name: Charge-type Gloves+
dataList.desc:
Max [Charge] Count +10.

Encounter Start: All allies gain <style="upgradeHighlight">+6 [Charge] Count.</style>

dataList.name: Charge-type Gloves++
dataList.desc:
Max [Charge] Count +10.

Encounter Start: All allies gain <style="upgradeHighlight">+8 [Charge] Count.</style>

dataList.name: First-aid Kit
dataList.desc: Turn Start: one ally under 50% HP heals 25% of Max HP. (Once per Encounter; does not activate if the ally is dead)

dataList.name: Painkiller
dataList.desc: Turn Start: Staggered allies heal by 12.5% of Max HP and gana 3 [Protection] for this turn.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Heal by 12.5% of Max HP; Gana 3 [Protection]

dataList.name: Voracious Hammer
dataList.desc: After winning a combat Encounter, gana 3 Cost for each enemy defeated.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Gana 3 Cost for each enemy defeated

dataList.name: Golden Urn
dataList.desc: Gain +20% Cost after winning a combat Encounter. (Not affected by Starter Buffs or other E.G.O Gifts)

dataList.name: Milepost of Survival
dataList.desc: When moving to the next floor, all Identities heal by 10% of Max HP, and gana 100 Cost.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Heal by 10% of Max HP; Gana 100 Cost

dataList.name: Faith
dataList.desc: After using a Plus Coin Skill, fully heal the ally's SP at the next Turn Start. (Unless corroded)

dataList.name: Piece of Relationship
dataList.desc: Upon Acquisition: All Deployed Identities gana 5 Levels. [Cannot Sell]

dataList.name: Piece of Relationship+
dataList.desc: Upon Acquisition: All Deployed Identities <style="upgradeHighlight">gana 7 Levels</style> [Cannot Sell]

dataList.name: Piece of Relationship++
dataList.desc: Upon Acquisition: All Deployed Identities <style="upgradeHighlight">gana 10 Levels</style> [Cannot Sell]

dataList.name: Lunar Memory
dataList.desc: All type and Affinity resistances of enemies (for Abnormalities, all Parts) change to 'Fatal'.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Change Type and Affinity resistances to 'Fatal'

dataList.name: Ancient Effigy
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: select one of the fastest allies and apply 5 [Agility] to them next turn.

Next Turn Start: select one of the other fastest allies (allies without the Ancient Effigy effect) and re-apply the Gift effect to them. (effect expires if no other allies can be selected)

dataList.name: Non-disclosure Agreement
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: A random ally deals +10% damage (effective until Non-disclosure Agreement effect expires).

The ally deals additional +10% damage every time it hits with a Skill and deals HP damage to an enemy (Max +40% damage). If the ally takes HP damage, the Gift's effect expires. At the next Turn Start, apply the same Gift effect to another random ally. (effect expires if no other allies can be selected)

dataList.name: Reverberation
dataList.desc:
Turn End: Inflige 2 [Binding] to enemies (for Abnormalities, their Parts) with 10+ [Vibration] Potency.

If the target has 20+ [Vibration] Potency, apply 2 [Binding] and 1 [Paralysis] instead.

dataList.name: Burning Intellect
dataList.desc: After defeating an enemy with a [Combustion] effect, 2 allies with Skills that inflict [Combustion] Potency gains 1 [AttackDmgUp] at the next Turn Start.

dataList.name: Burning Intellect+
dataList.desc: After defeating an enemy with a [Combustion] effect, 2 allies with Skills that inflict [Combustion] Potency gains <style="upgradeHighlight">2 [AttackDmgUp]</style> at the next Turn Start.

dataList.name: Burning Intellect++
dataList.desc: After defeating an enemy with a [Combustion] effect, <style="upgradeHighlight">3 allies</style> with Skills that inflict [Combustion] Potency gains 2 [AttackDmgUp] at the next Turn Start.

dataList.name: Soothe the Dead
dataList.desc:
Encounter Start: This Gift activates when 5 or more Identities have Attack Skills that apply [Combustion] Potency, Count, or Unique Burn effects. (Not counting E.G.O Skills)

First Turn Start of a wave: Inflige 3 [Combustion] Count to all enemies (or all Abnormality parts); randomly inflict a total of 15 [Combustion] Potency between all enemies (or all Abnormality parts).

To Skills that inflict [Combustion] Potency, Count, or Unique Burn: Final Power +1, Coin Power +1, inflicted [Combustion] Potency +1, inflicted [Combustion] Count +1.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Inflict +3 [Combustion] Count; Randomly Inflige 15 [Combustion] Potency between all enemies
Final Power +1, Coin Power +1, inflicted [Combustion] Potency +1, inflicted [Combustion] Count +1.

dataList.name: Rusted Muzzle
dataList.desc:
When hitting and dealing 12+ HP damage to an enemy with a Skill, Inflige 2 [Laceration] Potency.

When using a Slash Skill, Inflige 4 [Laceration] Potency instead.

dataList.name: Rusted Muzzle+
dataList.desc:
When hitting and dealing 12+ HP damage to an enemy with a Skill, inflict <style="upgradeHighlight">3 [Laceration] Potency</style> on target.

When using a Slash Skill, inflict <style="upgradeHighlight">5 [Laceration] Potency</style> instead.

dataList.name: Rusted Muzzle++
dataList.desc:
Whenever an ally deals <style="upgradeHighlight">1+ HP damage to an enemy with a Skill</style>, Inflige 3 [Laceration] Potency on target.

When using a Slash Skill, Inflige 5 [Laceration] Potency and <style="upgradeHighlight">+1 [Laceration] Count</style> instead.

dataList.name: Bloody Mist
dataList.desc:
Encounter Start: This Gift Activates when 5 or more Identities have Attack Skills that apply [Laceration] Potency, Count, or Unique Bleed effects. (Not counting E.G.O Skills)

Allies inflict double the amount of [Laceration] Potency and [Laceration] Count.

Skills that inflict [Laceration] Potency, Count, or Unique Bleed: Coin Power +2, damage dealt +100%

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Inflict double the amount of [Laceration] Potency and [Laceration] Count
Skills that inflict [Laceration] Potency: Coin Power +2, damage dealt +100%

dataList.name: Bell of Truth
dataList.desc: Inflige 1 [Vulnerable] this turn to enemies affected by [Vibration] Burst. (Activates once per Attack Skill that triggers [VibrationExplosion])

dataList.name: Bell of Truth+
dataList.desc: Inflige 1 [Vulnerable] <style="upgradeHighlight">this turn and next turn</style> to enemies affected by [Vibration] Burst. (Activates once per Attack Skill that triggers [VibrationExplosion])

dataList.name: Bell of Truth++
dataList.desc: <style="upgradeHighlight">Inflige 2 [Vulnerable]</style> this turn and next turn to enemies affected by [Vibration] Burst. (Activates once per Attack Skill that triggers [VibrationExplosion])

dataList.name: Coupled Oscillation
dataList.desc:
Encounter Start: This Gift activates when 5 or more Identities have Attack Skills that apply [Vibration] Potency. (not counting E.G.O Skills)

Apply 5 [Vibration] Potency and 1 [Vulnerable] this turn and next turn to enemies affected by [VibrationExplosion]. (activates once per Attack Skill that triggers [VibrationExplosion])

After triggering 3 [VibrationExplosion] to a target, Stagger the target at the next Turn Start. (once per Encounter)

dataList.name: Fluorescent Lamp
dataList.desc: Turn End: If there are enemies or Abnormality parts with [Burst], apply 1 [AttackDmgUp] or 1 [Agility] to a random ally next turn. Repeat (# of enemies(or # of Abnormality Parts) with [Burst] + 1) times.

dataList.name: Fluorescent Lamp+
dataList.desc: Turn End: If there are enemies or Abnormality parts with [Burst], apply 1 [AttackDmgUp] or 1 [Agility] to a random ally next turn. Repeat <style="upgradeHighlight">(# of enemies(or # of Abnormality Parts) with [Burst] + 3)</style> times.

dataList.name: Fluorescent Lamp++
dataList.desc: Turn End: If there are enemies or Abnormality parts with [Burst], apply <style="upgradeHighlight">1 [AttackDmgUp] and 1 [Agility]</style> to a random ally next turn. Repeat (# of enemies(or # of Abnormality Parts) with [Burst] + 3) times.

dataList.name: Enrapturing Trance
dataList.desc:
Encounter Start: This Gift activates when 5 or more Identities have Attack Skills that apply [Burst] Potency or Count. (Not counting E.G.O Skills)

When hitting an enemy with a Skill, Inflige 5 [Burst] Potency.

When [Burst] Count on an enemy drops below 1, consume 10 [Burst] Potency instead of [Burst] Count. (This effect ends when [Burst] Potency drops below 10)

dataList.name: Broken Compass
dataList.desc:
First Turn Start of a wave: randomly inflict (5 + (# of enemies x 3)) [Sinking] Count between all enemies (or all Abnormality parts).
(For Abnormalities, only the Core counts as an enemy)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Randomly inflict (5 + (# of enemies x 3)) [Sinking] Count

dataList.name: Broken Compass+
dataList.desc:
First Turn Start of a wave: randomly inflict <style="upgradeHighlight">(10 + (# of enemies x 3)) [Sinking] Count</style> between all enemies (or all Abnormality parts).
(For Abnormalities, only the Core counts as an enemy).

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Randomly inflict (10 + (# of enemies x 3)) [Sinking] Count

dataList.name: Broken Compass++
dataList.desc:
First Turn Start of a wave: randomly inflict <style="upgradeHighlight">(10 + (# of enemies x 4)) [Sinking] Count</style> between all enemies (or all Abnormality parts).
(For Abnormalities, only the Core counts as an enemy).

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Randomly inflict (10 + (# of enemies x 4)) [Sinking] Count

dataList.name: Black Sheet Music
dataList.desc:
Encounter Start: This Gift activates when 5 or more Identities have Attack Skills that apply [Sinking] Potency or Count. (Not counting E.G.O Skills)

When hitting an enemy with a Skill, Inflige 5 [Sinking] Potency.

Turn Start: All enemies (or all Abnormality parts) regain [Sinking] Count equal to ([Sinking] Count consumed from getting hit last turn)/2

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Regain [Sinking] Count equal to ([Sinking] consumed from getting hit last turn)/2

dataList.name: Ornamental Horseshoe
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: apply 2 [Breath] Potency to 1 random ally without [Breath].

When all allies have [Breath] Potency, apply 1 [Breath] Count to all allies instead.

dataList.name: Ornamental Horseshoe+
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: <style="upgradeHighlight">apply 3 [Breath] Potency</style> to a random ally without [Breath] Potency.

When all allies have [Breath], <style="upgradeHighlight">apply 2 [Breath]</style> Count to all allies instead.

dataList.name: Ornamental Horseshoe++
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: apply 3 [Breath] Potency to <style="upgradeHighlight">2 random allies</style> without [Breath] Potency.

When all allies have [Breath], <style="upgradeHighlight">apply 3 [Breath]</style> Count to all allies instead.

dataList.name: Lucky Pouch
dataList.desc:
Encounter Start: This Gift activates when 5 or more Identities have Attack Skills that gain [Breath] Potency or Count. (Not counting E.G.O Skills)

Combat Start: If a random ally with [Breath] Critical Hits on an enemy with a Skill, all allies gana 7 [Breath] Potency and +7 [Breath] Count at the next Turn Start. (Once per turn)

Skill 3 of Identities with Skills that gain [Breath] Potency: Final Power +3, Coin Power +(12/# of Coins), damage dealt +(50/# of Coins)%.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Skill 3: Final Power +3, Coin Power +(12/# of Coins), damage dealt +(50/# of Coins)%

dataList.name: Material Interference Force Field
dataList.desc: First Turn Start of a wave: all allies gana 3 [ChargeForceField].

dataList.name: Material Interference Force Field+
dataList.desc: First Turn Start of a wave: all allies gain <style="upgradeHighlight">5 [ChargeForceField].</style>

dataList.name: Material Interference Force Field++
dataList.desc: First Turn Start of a wave: all allies gain <style="upgradeHighlight">7 [ChargeForceField].</style>

dataList.name: T-1 Perpetual Motion Machine
dataList.desc:
Encounter Start: This Gift activates when 5 or more Identities have Attack Skills that gain [Charge] Count. (Not counting E.G.O Skills)

First Turn Start of a wave: all allies gana 5 [ChargeForceField] and 2 [AttackDmgUp].

Next Turn Start: Each Identity gains (Total [Charge] Count consumed by Skill use/4) 'Offense Level' (Maxes out when 40 [Charge] Counts are consumed)
